official_title: To require the Secretary of Commerce to establish a program for providing grants to projects that promote composting of solid waste produced by commercial and recreation fishing.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Commerce, through the National Sea Grant College Program, to establish a program for providing grants for composting of solid waste produced by commercial and recreational fishing.

titles.title: To require the Secretary of Commerce to establish a program for providing grants to projects that promote composting of solid waste produced by commercial and recreation fishing.
